mapper.insert: insert into alarm (ALARM_ID,MEMBER_ID,ALARM_CODE,ALARM_DATE,url, ALARM_CONTENT ) values(ALM_SEQ.nextval, ${MEMBER_ID}, #{ALARM_CODE}, sysdate,${URL},#{ALARM_CONTENT})
mapper.select: select *from (select ALARM_ID, MEMBER_ID, ALARM_CODE, ALARM_DATE, URL, ALARM_CONTENT from ALARM where member_id=${member_id} and Alarm_OK=0 order by ALARM_DATE DESC)where rownum <= 5
